mapper.select: SELECT A.PID, A.PRODUCT_CODE, A.PRODUCT_NAME, A.PRODUCT_TYPE, (select note from crmii.txtdm where FLDM='PRODUCT' and ibm = a.product_type) PRODUCT_TYPE_COVER, A.RECOMMEND_REASON, A.NAV_LASTEST, A.RRINTHREEMONTH, A.NAV_DATE, A.INTRODUCION, A.INTRODUCION_MOBILE, A.HOTSELL_FLAG, A.NEWSELL_FLAG, A.RECOMMEND_FLAG, A.IMGID, A.STATUS_FLAG FROM CRMII.T_PRODUCT_SELL_ALL A
